name: V1_Ch10_EmergenceCriterion_Theorem
intent: Specify criteria under which primitive configurations produce emergent, persistent semantic structures.

constraints.persistence: Emergent structures must persist over multiple χ-steps.
constraints.Σ-stability: Σ must not immediately collapse them to trivial forms.
constraints.Π-meaningfulness: Emergent structures must be Π-evaluable with non-trivial truth content.

cross_links.volume2_ch1: First Stable Modes satisfy these emergence criteria.
cross_links.volume2_module_pack: Module pack encodes these as preconditions.
